channel.title: Projects on Rusty Eddy
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Rusty Eddy

item.title: Sensor Station
item.description: SensorStation is built with an esp32 WRoom32 development board, with a temprature sensor and a standard wifi connection, it is able to periodically broadcast the local temprature via MQTT. Features Thermo32 has the following features currently implemented: Temprature sampling with tmp36 Wifi connection to broadcast temprature MQTT client to advertise temprature to broker LED is flashed to indicate temprature has been sampled and broadcast. ESP-IDF / FreeRTOS, small, concurrent efficient and flexible.

item.title: SPA Clock
item.description: Description SPA Clock is an embedded webserver intended to run on a Rasberry Pi (or similar linux system) with a touchscreen and Internet connection. This clock comes with Zero Touch configuration. Just plug it in, connect it to the internet and always have accurate time! Even through power outages and timezone changes, you’ll never have to reset your clock again. Now wait, that is not all! You also get other cool things like the date and current local weather!
